message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a generous offer considering I'm starting the negotiations. Let's wrap this up quickly.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be fair.  I propose a 52/48 split in my favor.  We're losing money fast with this inflation!
Bob, let's be realistic. We both lose with every round. I'm offering you 4500.  Take it before it shrinks further!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it 50/50 and call it a day.  Any more rounds and we'll both be losing out significantly.
